ModMetaData.name: Yayo's Planet
ModMetaData.author: YAYO, Horsefry
ModMetaData.description:
A disaster that begins every 4th quarter of each year. Ice Age, Infernal Planet
Check the weather forecast generated at the bottom right after the game starts. The disaster will begin in the 4th quarter of each year. Use a natural air conditioner, not an air conditioner. At high temperatures, only natural air conditioners work. You can adjust the temperature in options. Disaster type can be turned on and off. If multiple catastrophes are on, they are randomized every year.
